verses.verse: Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord,<WH3068> for He is good;<WH2896> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the God<WH430> of gods,<WH430> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH113> of lords,<WH113> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
To Him who alone<WH905> does<WH6213> great<WH1419> wonders,<WH6381> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting;<WH5769>
To Him who made<WH6213> the heavens<WH8064> with skill,<WH8394> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting;<WH5769>
To Him who spread<WH7554> out the earth<WH776> above<WH5921> the waters,<WH4325> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting;<WH5769>
To Him who made<WH6213> [the] great<WH1419> lights,<WH216> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting: <WH5769>
The sun<WH8121> to rule<WH4475> by day,<WH3117> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
The moon<WH3394> and stars<WH3556> to rule<WH4475> by night,<WH3915> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
To Him who smote<WH5221> the Egyptians<WH4714> in their first-born, For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
And brought<WH3318> Israel<WH3478> out from their midst,<WH8432> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
With a strong<WH2389> hand<WH3027> and an outstretched<WH5186> arm,<WH2220> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting;<WH5769>
To Him who divided<WH1504> the Red<WH5488> <WH3220> Sea<WH3220> asunder,<WH1506> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
And made Israel<WH3478> pass<WH5674> through the midst<WH8432> of it, For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting;<WH5769>
But He overthrew<WH5287> Pharaoh<WH6547> and his army<WH2428> in the Red<WH5488> <WH3220> Sea,<WH3220> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
To Him who led<WH1980> His people<WH5971> through the wilderness,<WH4057> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting;<WH5769>
To Him who smote<WH5221> great<WH1419> kings,<WH4428> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
And slew<WH2026> mighty<WH117> kings,<WH4428> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting: <WH5769>
Sihon,<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
And Og,<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
And gave<WH5414> their land<WH776> as a heritage,<WH5159> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
Even a heritage<WH5159> to Israel<WH3478> His servant,<WH5650> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
Who<WH7945> remembered<WH2142> us in our low<WH8216> estate,<WH8216> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting,<WH5769>
And has rescued<WH6561> us from our adversaries,<WH6862> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting;<WH5769>
Who gives<WH5414> food<WH3899> to all<WH3605> flesh,<WH1320> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the God<WH410> of heaven,<WH8064> For His lovingkindness<WH2617> is everlasting.<WH5769>
